dcterms:creator: R. Ratcliff
dcterms:description: A mathematical model that simultaneously accounts for response time (RT) and choice data obtained from two-alternative decision tasks, positing that individuals accumulate evidence for decision alternatives until a threshold is met.
dcterms:title: DDM (Diffusion Decision Model)

dcterms:creator: A. Voss
K. Rothermund
J. Voss
dcterms:description: A task where individuals must decide whether there are more blue or more orange pixels in a patch of pixels, with difficulty manipulated by adjusting the ratio of colors.
dcterms:title: Color Discrimination Task

dcterms:creator: K. Cranmer
J. Brehmer
G. Louppe
dcterms:description: A framework for conducting Bayesian inference using simulations, allowing for the estimation of model parameters without requiring explicit likelihood functions.
dcterms:title: Simulation-based Inference (SBI)

dcterms:creator: S. T. Radev
M. Schmitt
L. Schumacher
L. Elsemüller
V. Pratz
Y. Schälte
U. Kothe
P.-C. Bürkner
dcterms:description: A framework that utilizes neural networks to perform amortized Bayesian workflows, facilitating efficient Bayesian inference and model comparison.
dcterms:title: BayesFlow Framework
